Double-click_a_field_or_use_the_button_t.text: Double-click a field or use the button to insert

Use_button_add_the_date_of_printing.text: Use button add the date of printing

help_step.name: tour_1
help_step.text: Select the field type. Available fields will be shows in Available Fields box.

help_step.name: tour_2
help_step.text: Double-click a field or use the button to insert. Field will be insert in Editor box.

help_step.name: tour_3
help_step.text: Click the Insert Date button to insert the date field in layout

help_step.name: tour_4
help_step.text: Editor is used to add content to the layout sections.
